name: Ludum Meta
description:
Balance life responsibilities with game development! You have 48 hours! Ignore life and things will go all kinds of wrong! Ignore game dev and you won't be able to finish your game on time!

This game was made for Ludum Dare 44. The theme was Your Life is Currency. I went with a meta concept about a  game in which you make a game.

Just use your mouse, click on a button, and find that balance of work hours. Good luck!
